column5: As stated, going to stay at Runk Island Camp at Southwest part of North Caribou for first time. Have stayed 4 times previous at N Caribou, once at N Caribou Camps in 2007,and 3 times at Pickle Lake Outpost camp on Northwest end of N Caribou in 2027,18 and 19. Would like to find out more about the Runk Island Camp, fishing and just general impressions of this area Thank You Larry S
